00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         template <typename T, precision P>
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> rotate
00014         (
00015                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v,
00016                 T const & angle
00017         )
00018         {
00019                 detail::tvec2<T, P> Result;
00020 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00021                 T const Cos(cos(angle));
00022                 T const Sin(sin(angle));
00023 #else
00024 #               pragma message("GLM: rotate function taking degrees as parameters is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00025                 T const Cos = cos(radians(angle));
00026                 T const Sin = sin(radians(angle));
00027 #endif
00028                 Result.x = v.x * Cos - v.y * Sin;
00029                 Result.y = v.x * Sin + v.y * Cos;
00030                 return Result;
00031         }
00032 
00033         template <typename T, precision P>
00034         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> rotate
00035         (
00036                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v,
00037                 T const & angle,
00038                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & normal
00039         )
00040         {
00041                 return detail::tmat3x3<T, P>(glm::rotate(angle, normal)) * v;
00042         }
00043         /*
00044         template <typename T, precision P>
00045         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> rotateGTX(
00046                 const detail::tvec3<T, P>& x,
00047                 T angle,
00048                 const detail::tvec3<T, P>& normal)
00049         {
00050                 const T Cos = cos(radians(angle));
00051                 const T Sin = sin(radians(angle));
00052                 return x * Cos + ((x * normal) * (T(1) - Cos)) * normal + cross(x, normal) * Sin;
00053         }
00054         */
00055         template <typename T, precision P>
00056         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<T, P> rotate
00057         (
00058                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const & v,
00059                 T const & angle,
00060                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & normal
00061         )
00062         {
00063                 return rotate(angle, normal) * v;
00064         }
00065 
00066         template <typename T, precision P>
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> rotateX
00068         (
00069                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v,
00070                 T const & angle
00071         )
00072         {
00073                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Result(v);
00074 
00075 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00076                 T const Cos(cos(angle));
00077                 T const Sin(sin(angle));
00078 #else
00079 #               pragma message("GLM: rotateX function taking degrees as parameters is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00080                 T const Cos = cos(radians(angle));
00081                 T const Sin = sin(radians(angle));
00082 #endif
00083 
00084                 Result.y = v.y * Cos - v.z * Sin;
00085                 Result.z = v.y * Sin + v.z * Cos;
00086                 return Result;
00087         }
00088 
00089         template <typename T, precision P>
00090         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> rotateY
00091         (
00092                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v,
00093                 T const & angle
00094         )
00095         {
00096                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Result = v;
00097 
00098 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00099                 T const Cos(cos(angle));
00100                 T const Sin(sin(angle));
00101 #else
00102 #               pragma message("GLM: rotateY function taking degrees as parameters is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00103                 T const Cos(cos(radians(angle)));
00104                 T const Sin(sin(radians(angle)));
00105 #endif
00106 
00107                 Result.x =  v.x * Cos + v.z * Sin;
00108                 Result.z = -v.x * Sin + v.z * Cos;
00109                 return Result;
00110         }
00111

00128 #endif

00130                 Result.x = v.x * Cos - v.y * Sin;

00200                 Result.y = v.x * Sin + v.y * Cos;

00204         template <typename T, precision P>
00205         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> orientation
00206         (
00207                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & Normal,
00208                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & Up
00209         )
00210         {
00211                 if(all(equal(Normal, Up)))
00212                         return detail::tmat4x4<T, P>(T(1));
00213 
00214                 detail::tvec3<T, P> RotationAxis = cross(Up, Normal);
00215 #               ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00216                         T Angle = acos(dot(Normal, Up));
00217 #               else
00218 #                       pragma message("GLM: rotateZ function taking degrees as parameters is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00219                         T Angle = degrees(acos(dot(Normal, Up)));
00220 #               endif
00221                 return rotate(Angle, RotationAxis);
00222         }
00223 }//namespace glm
